thread.title: Alleged Moto Z 2017 leaked in live images, expected to boast Snapdragon 835 SoC
thread.title_full: Alleged Moto Z 2017 leaked in live images, expected to boast Snapdragon 835 SoC

title: Alleged Moto Z 2017 leaked in live images, expected to boast Snapdragon 835 SoC
text:
Alleged Moto Z 2017 leaked in live images, expected to boast Snapdragon... Alleged Moto Z 2017 leaked in live images, expected to boast Snapdragon 835 SoC By - March 10, 2017 “The Moto Z’s 2017 variant is expected to sport a dual-tone selfie flash and an oval-shaped home button” 
Several reports in the past couple of weeks have been suggesting that Lenovo is working on the 2017 variant of the Moto Z ( review ) modular smartphone. The alleged Moto Z 2017 was recently spotted on Geekbench , and now a couple of live images of the phone have also been leaked online. 
It appears US telecom operator Sprint and Moto teamed up to show off the former’s upcoming Gigabit LTE service in the New Orleans area. The companies used an unnamed Moto smartphone running the upcoming Gigabit LTE-capable Snapdragon 835 SoC. If reports are to be believed, the Moto Z’s 2017 variant will feature this SoC. Unfortunately, the design of the Moto Z (2017) is not visible in the images since the device is covered in tape. 
Sprint in a release said that the Moto device that was used to showcase its Gigabit LTE technology is a “forthcoming flagship”. This hits that the mysterious phone may be the Moto Z 2017. The phone is expected to sport four antenna bands to handle the high-speed Gigabit LTE internet speeds.In addition, an alleged image of a Moto Z 2017 model with a dual-tone selfie flash and a new oval-shaped home button from MWC 2017 event is doing rounds on the interwebs.
